text: aur anaath ke dhan ke sameep na jao, parantu aise dhang se, jo uchit ho. yahaan tak ki vah apanee yuva avastha ko pahunch jaaye tatha naap-tol nyaay ke saath poora karo. ham kisee praan par usakee sakat se adhik bhaar nahin rakhate aur jab bolo to nyaay karo, yadyapi sameepavartee hee kyon na ho aur allaah ka vachan poora karo, usane tumhen isaka aadesh diya hai, sambhavatah tum shiksha grahan karo
